card: width: 190px; height: 254px; position: relative; border-radius: 16px; border-radius: 16px; background: #4caf4f; transition: box-shadow .3s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275); overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer;
card-info: position: absolute; width: 100%; bottom: 0; padding: 0.9rem; align-items: flex-end; display: flex; align-items: flex-end;
card-icon: opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20%); width: 2em; height: 2em; transition: all .3s ease-in-out;
button-subtittle: border-radius:7px; margin-left:0px; margin-top:5px; background-color:transparent; border:transparent; text-decoration: underline;
